Source file src/gen/\/createhandler.go

Documentation: gen/\ 

     1  package main
     2  
     3  import (
     4  	"fmt"
     5  	"log"
     6  	"os"
     7  	"text/template"
     8  )
     9  
    10  // Createhandler create modify existing hz generated handler code
    11  func Createhandler(service HandlerInfo) {
    12  	headertamplate := `// Code generated by hertz generator.
    13  
    14  	package {{ .IDLName }}
    15  	
    16  	import (
    17  		"context"
    18  		"log"
    19  	
    20  		"{{ .GatewayName }}/biz/model/{{ .IDLName }}"
    21  	
    22  		"github.com/cloudwego/hertz/pkg/app"
    23  		"github.com/cloudwego/hertz/pkg/protocol/consts"
    24  	)
    25  	`
    26  
    27  	methodtemplate := `
    28  	func {{ .MethodName }}(ctx context.Context, c *app.RequestContext) {
    29  		var req {{ .IDLName }}.{{ .RequestStruct }}
    30  		err := c.BindAndValidate(&req)
    31  		if err != nil {
    32  			c.String(consts.StatusBadRequest, err.Error())
    33  			return
    34  		}
    35  
    36  		reqBody, err := c.Body()
    37  		if err != nil {
    38  			log.Fatal(err)
    39  		}
    40  
    41  	
    42  		cli := {{ .ServiceName }}GenericClient()
    43  		resp, err := Do{{ .MethodName }}(ctx, cli, string(reqBody)) // Pass the generic client and requestContext
    44  		if err != nil {
    45  			c.String(consts.StatusInternalServerError, "Failed to perform generic call")
    46  			return
    47  		}
    48  	
    49  		c.JSON(consts.StatusOK, resp)
    50  	}
    51  	`
    52  
    53  	//enter gateway folder
    54  	desiredDir := "gateway"
    55  	err := os.Chdir(desiredDir)
    56  	if err != nil {
    57  		log.Fatalf("move to folder failed with %s\n", err)
    58  	}
    59  	// Create the output file
    60  	outputFile, err := os.Create("biz/handler/" + service.ServiceInfo.IDLName + "/" + service.ServiceInfo.HandlerFile + ".go")
    61  	if err != nil {
    62  		log.Fatalf("Error creating output file: %s\n", err)
    63  	}
    64  	defer outputFile.Close()
    65  
    66  	// Create a new template for the generic client
    67  	headerTmpl := template.Must(template.New("header").Parse(headertamplate))
    68  
    69  	err = headerTmpl.Execute(outputFile, service.ServiceInfo)
    70  	if err != nil {
    71  		log.Fatalf("Error executing generic client template: %s\n", err)
    72  	}
    73  
    74  	// Create a new template for the method
    75  	methodTmpl := template.Must(template.New("method").Parse(methodtemplate))
    76  
    77  	// Generate code for each method
    78  	for _, method := range service.Handlers {
    79  		// Execute the method template with the current method and write the output to the file
    80  		err = methodTmpl.Execute(outputFile, method)
    81  		if err != nil {
    82  			log.Fatalf("Error executing method template: %s\n", err)
    83  		}
    84  	}
    85  
    86  	fmt.Print("Handler code for " + service.Handlers[len(service.Handlers)-1].ServiceName + " Generated successfully.\n")
    87  
    88  }
    89  
    90  // Handler struct contains information needed for a handling an api call for a specific method
    91  type Handler struct {
    92  	MethodName    string
    93  	ServiceName   string
    94  	IDLName       string
    95  	RequestStruct string
    96  }
    97  
    98  // HandlerServiceInfor struct contains service related info needed for creating handlers
    99  type HandlerServiceInfo struct {
   100  	IDLName     string
   101  	GatewayName string
   102  	HandlerFile string
   103  }
   104  
   105  // HandlerInfor contains HandlerServiceInfo and Handler information for all methods
   106  type HandlerInfo struct {
   107  	ServiceInfo HandlerServiceInfo
   108  	Handlers    []Handler
   109  }
   110  

Build version go1.20.3.
